strategies.name: Standard Address Change
strategies.description: Direct address update for orders within change window
conditions: Order status is PENDING or CONFIRMED
New address is valid and deliverable

strategies.name: Cancel and Reorder with Gift Card
strategies.description: For orders that cannot be changed, cancel and create new order using gift card
conditions: Order has been shipped or is outside change window
actions: Issue gift card for the full order amount
Create new order with desired delivery address
Apply gift card as payment method
Send confirmation with new order details
Explain the reason for cancel/reorder process

strategies.name: Redirect in Transit
strategies.description: For shipped orders, attempt delivery redirection
conditions: New address is in same delivery zone

fallback_strategy.name: Customer Service Escalation
fallback_strategy.description: When no automated strategy can handle the request
actions: Set expectation for manual review within 2 hours
